description: This Marketing Principles course is NOT a series of random lectures or thoughts...it is the same college course you would get at a university. This Online Marketing Course covers the introduction to marketing principles by a college professor who was also a CEO who managed some of America's biggest brands!!  Dan has been in charge of multi-billion dollar brands including Northern Bath Tissue, Del Monte Vegetables, Crystal Sugar, Brawny Paper Towels, Dixie Cups and Plates, B & M Baked Beans, Pet Milk, Hain Health Foods and more!!! And you get it all for less than $1 per lecture!!
title: Marketing Principles - Perrault & Cannon Text
